April 21, 2020 Following Governor Mike DeWine’s announcement on Monday, April 20, 2020 to keep school buildings closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, I wanted to share the following information with you. First, we will continue remote

In honor of our graduating seniors, the Class of 2020, Wayne Local School will be participating in a drive-by of Spartan Community Field tonight at 8:20pm. (20:20 Military Time) This #BeTheLight recognition will be on for 20 minutes to honor our seniors

h3.a: PayPal Link Established to Receive Donations

div.p: Wayne Local has established a PayPal link for donations during this unprecedented time. There are many difficult strains on families right her in our community and while some families are adapting, there are many others who are

h3.a: UPDATE FROM GOVERNOR DEWINE AS OF 4/20/2020:

div.p: Governor Mike DeWine announced Monday that all K-12 schools in Ohio will continue remote learning for the remainder of the school year due to the coronavirus pandemic. DeWine said a decision has NOT been made about reopening classrooms for the

Thank you to the team of volunteers who work to ensure our community in need is taken care of. If you'd like to help, but are unsure how, we are in need of monetary donations to keep the program going. We have established a PayPal link to
